SEARCH
Module com.example.rubankfx
Package com.example.rubankfx

Class Savings

java.lang.Object
com.example.rubankfx.Account
com.example.rubankfx.Savings
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Account>
Direct Known Subclasses:
MoneyMarket
public class Savings extends Account
Represents a Savings account type which extends the base Account class. The Savings account has properties that determine if the account holder is loyal, the interest rates for the savings account, a bonus interest rate for loyal customers, a monthly fee for balances less than the minimum balance, and the minimum balance required to avoid a monthly fee.
Author:
Digvijay Singh, Arun Felix

    • applyWithdraw

      public void applyWithdraw()
      Deducts the monthly fee and interest from the account balance. The method subtracts the monthly fee and the monthly interest from the account balance to reflect the changes that occur during a monthly withdrawal operation. The monthly fee is deducted first, followed by the monthly interest (if applicable). If the account has a loyalty bonus, the interest will be adjusted accordingly.
      Specified by:
      applyWithdraw in class Account
